  • CodeSystem Medication Dose Unit

    • ImplementationGuide[http://www.fhir.org/guides/mfhir/ImplementationGuide/openmhealth.mfhir-0.0.0] - Local Development build (v0.0.0). See the Directory of published versions

    • Narrative Content
    • JSON
    Defining URL:http://www.fhir.org/guides/mfhir/CodeSystem/medication-dose-unit
    Version:0.0.0
    Name:medication-dose-unit
    Status:All the concepts defined by the code system are included in the code system resource
    Definition:

    The list of most commonly used units of measure for a medication dose. Suggestions for additions are accepted.

    Source Resource:JSON

    medication-dose-unit

    The list of most commonly used units of measure for a medication dose. Suggestions for additions are accepted.

    This code system http://www.fhir.org/guides/mfhir/CodeSystem/medication-dose-unit defines the following codes:

    CodeDisplayDefinition
    % %
    AU AU
    AU/mL AU/mL
    bar bar
    BAU BAU
